issue.subject: Basket surface message is not well formated, should be splitted
issue.description:
Current message : 
[EN]
Your current selection of %SURFACE is not in the allowed surface range [%SURFACEMIN,%SURFACEMAX].
Your current selection of 16605241.443363762 is not in the allowed surface range [, 200000].
[FR]
Votre sélection actuelle de 16605241.443363762 n'est pas dans la plage autorisée de surface [, 200000].
* If there's not min OR max value, the bracket range is strange. ** I propose to have 2 messages, one for "too large" and one for "too small" selections. * Units are not displayed. ** Display units (the surface should use km² if the area is > 1000000 m²) ** Values rounded (2 digits after the decimal separator). ** If the surface selected is in km² the indication should use the same Result max: 
[EN]
Your current selection of 16.61 km² exceeds the 0.2 km² limit.
[FR]
Votre sélection actuelle de 16.61 km² dépasse la limite de 0.2 km².
Result min: 
[EN]
Your current selection of 88.96 m² is under the 1000 m² minimum.
[FR]
Votre sélection actuelle de 88.96 m² est inférieure au minimum de 1000 m².
